name: ThemeConnect
0:
”Alexa open Theme Connect”
”Alexa play Theme Connect”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: theme connect
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Puzzle Games.

In this game you need to connect word themes together. Choose from 3 categories: Colours, Food or Celebrities. I will start by saing a word, then you need to say a word back that begins with the last letter of my word.

For example, if the category was food…
PizzA
AppleS
SteaK
KalE
Eggplant

Keep on connecting the words until you can’t think of any more! See how many you can get in a row to beat your high score.

Good Luck
 If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Puzzle Games.

HUGO FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
